alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:42PM EST until February 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations of up to a glaze combined with total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of southern Lower Michigan. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact Friday`s morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Behind this area of precipitation tonight, an area of lake effect snow is expected to take over mainly for areas west of IN-31 into the daytime Friday. Up to an additional 1 to 2 inches of snow can be expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
